patches.title: Version - 0.8
patches.breif: Happy New Year! With the new year brings new designs and optimizations for the website editor! The Menu now opens by clicking the "Menu" button in the top right, and all elements now update live while typing the new content!

patch.desc: Changed the design of the editor
Changed the way the base url saves in the cms files (Will help solve domain change induced bugs)
Fixed a bug causing images to not upload
